body: Can you show your configuration and SQL?

> @SanmuWangZJU What safty do you want? Can you point out what bad will happen while the cach is not thread safe?

I'm not sure what will happen if the cache is not thread-safe, but I think we should keep cache safety while trying to read and update the cache concurrently (it will trigger update cache because key of cache is soft-reference).

@SanmuWangZJU Nothing bad will happen if the cache is not thread-safe. Don't mix soft-reference with thread-safe, they can not influence each other. You can just imagine the data structure is HashMap.
Hi, @xiyelife According to my understanding, this is not a problem, still thank you for actively submitting the issue.
@betterjava  yeah , I can solve this problem by modifying my sql. but for mybatis framework generated sqls  could have this problem

> https://builds.apache.org/blue/organizations/jenkins/shardingsphere-ci/detail/shardingsphere-ci/461/pipeline/

this build is not the latest build of your pull request, it's one of the early build when you didn't add the license header, the latest failure is not about license header (https://builds.apache.org/blue/organizations/jenkins/shardingsphere-ci/detail/shardingsphere-ci/462/pipeline/), it failed because of the instability of coverall.io, we can do nothing but wait for it to recover

For my understanding, use lots of static fields should be avoid for design reason.

If you want focus unit test, how about add test cases without static fields?
Thank you for your reply. I will modify the code according to your prompt, but it is not clear that the GPL license dependent, NACOS registry can not be integrated into shardingsphereï¼Ÿ

Hi,
Failover automatically is a practical feature i think.

Currently, any changes on zk will be synchronized to apps online. So the key point is `who` can tell the zk all the new rules, e.g new ip and port.
What's more, Monitoring the status of dbs is another topic.


If anyone is interested in them, i hope you can join us to help community. Thanks :)






 Juan Pan


panjuan@apache.org
Juan Pan(Trista), Apache ShardingSphere

> Did you mean you use `sharding-jdbc-core` as version `2.0.0.M1`, but use `sharding-jdbc-spring-namespace` as version `4.0.0-RC2`?

I don't mean that.above is my project configuration,when i batch insert records ,the memory corruption(2G-40000records) ,I donâ€˜t whats wrong with me

Nacos-client dependent MySQL-JDBC driver which is GPL, so we can not inculde Nacos-client into ShardingSphere.
But we can let user to add Nacos-client by themselves, so it is fine if we change maven scope from `compile` (default) to `provided`.

done change pom will solve the problom
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.shardingsphere</groupId>
    <artifactId>sharding-jdbc-core</artifactId>
    <version>4.0.0-RC2</version>
</dependency>
      <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.shardingsphere</groupId>
            <artifactId>sharding-jdbc-spring-namespace</artifactId>
            <version>4.0.0-RC2</version>
        </dependency>

fixed it. issue link:  https://github.com/apache/incubator-shardingsphere/issues/3126
document link:  https://shardingsphere.apache.org/document/current/en/manual/sharding-jdbc/usage/encrypt/

Hi @terrymanu , I've always understood that shardingsphere only provide SPI and default implementationï¼Œfor the other special implementationï¼Œimplement shardingsphereâ€˜s SPIï¼Œdon't need mege to shardingsphere.

for exampleï¼Œ for Registry centerï¼š
shardingsphere provide `org.apache.shardingsphere.orchestration.reg.api.RegistryCenter ` interface and default ZooKeeper Registry center, for the other special implementation, like Nacosã€apolloï¼Œwe can implement it but not need submit PR to shardingsphere.

do I misunderstand?

@dongzl Sure, Other reg center which implement shardingsphere's SPI. And  we prefer accept those pull request into shardingsphere, and let user to choice by themselves.
If you are interesting for other reg center's implementations, you may create a new issue and provide pull request as same way.

This pull request is too big, I just review something, but found some problems.

1. Should not use `threadlocal` to handle `ShardingConnection`, it will cause the code hard to understand, and may cause multiple threads problems.
2. Class `MySQLNowExpressionCovertExtractor` is in sharding-jdbc component, how to deal with sharding-proxy if they need use this feature too?
3. `MySQLNowExpressionCovertExtractor` should be in parse module. Right now, it is in jdbc module. This module is for access endpoint only, we should not add parse and sharding logics here.
4. use `ShardingConnection` in `MySQLNowExpressionCovertExtractor` is unacceptable, because the parse module is a lower layer which should not aware any upper layers, the module dependency is revert here.
5. I notice this pr add some new SPI in parse layer that is not same abstract level with original parse SPI, it will make user confuse, any SPI added should fully discuss first.

Because the design and direction of this pr may have some problems, so shall I close this pr, and we use mailing-list to talk about design first?

Hi @terrymanu, I have communicated with Apollo team, they think read config and modify config design for different roles, so they split the Apollo API.

For read config API design for application system, it is high availability, and it is not any limit.

But for modify config API design for other config system to sync configuration to Apollo, it need token validation and must have modify config rights, they think modify config must be very careful, if operate error, it make a mistake for application system.

So they split the Apollo API. 
`apollo-client` is for application systemï¼Œit provide read config API and monitor config change API;
`apollo-openapi` is for other config system, it provide read config API and modify config API.

This is the discuss issue: https://github.com/ctripcorp/apollo/issues/2635

In ShardingSphere `org.apache.shardingsphere.orchestration.config.api.ConfigCenter` interface have read and modify API. I think we still have to integrate the two client API. Do you have other suggestions?
**For English only**, other languages will not accept.
